name: Find Mr Peanut
description:
Your dog, Mr. Peanut, has been kidnapped this morning! Find who did it by questioning the people in your village. News travels fast in the village, so if you ask too many questions, the culprit will hear about it and be on their guard. Therefore, you will only be able to ask 10 questions.
Once you've run out of questions, you will have to point out who kidnapped Mr.Peanut by walking to him/her and pressing interact. Only then will you learn the truth.
Your questions will be very valuable so use them wisely, make it count!

WASD To move.
E to interact with villagers/objects
I to open Inventory/Notes

Animations from Mixamo
Font used in thumbnail is Goodog cool
Vegetation/Rocks from Environment Set by NatureManufacture
Dialogue Plugin from CodeSpartan
